                "In rare cases, you may need the application to do something available only to root. this can be done via a “Stored Procedure” that has "
              ],
              ["SECURITY DEFINER", [["c"]]],
              [
                " (and root defines it). That will expose only what the SP does, which might, for example, be one particular action on one particular table."
